text: Everyday I Love You is a 2015 Filipino romantic drama movie directed by Mae Cruz-Alviar and starring Liza Soberano, Enrique Gil, Gerald Anderson, Aiko Melendez, Carmina Villaroel, Marissa Delgado, Marita Zobel, Eva Darren. It was distributed by Star Cinema. == Other websites == * Category:2015 romantic drama movies Category:Filipino movies
title: Everyday I Love You (2015 movie)
